div.p: Please click "read more" for information regarding enrollment for Preschool next year 20-21.

img.alt: Details from MN Governor Walz's Press Conference on March 25, 2020

a.span: Details from MN Governor Walz's Press Conference on March 25, 2020

a.title: Go to comments for Details from MN Governor Walz's Press Conference on March 25, 2020

div.p: On Tuesday, March 4, Deputy Dustin Demuth from the Lyon County Sheriff's Department offered a presentation on internet and social media safety for all 6-8 students. Social media has become a staple in the lives of most students and adults. Click "Read More" for more information, including a video of the presentation and a download of the powerpoint used.

a.title: Go to comments for Internet Safety

div.p: The Senior Class Flower is a lavender rose. The color is called Ocean Song. The Senior Class Quote is: "Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory." Dr. Seuss (Theodor Seuss Geisel)

a.title: Go to comments for Senior Items

div.p: Be sure to check out the daily bulletin for the Elementary School to stay up to date on upcoming events!
